name: Truc Lam Tay Thien Zen Monastery and Zen tour - find your soul in peace
description:
Tay Thien – Into the Vietnamese Buddism is the unique tour which gives you chance to put first steps into Vietnam Buddhism; tranquil and peace atmosphere, help you find the feeling of relaxing in spirit after the small concerns of daily life.
Paying a visit for Trúc Lâm Zen Monastery and Tay Thien – Land of Vietnamese Buddism, you will have chance to experience life of Buddists, daily life’s activities of monks and nuns: chanting, repentance, meditation, listen to Buddhism ... as well as enjoy wild and natural landscapes where monk generations choose to be training place. 
To be organized recently from August of 2011 up to now, there have been 100 trips with more than 1200 arrivals, I have received lost of positive comments from people who joined in this tour. After the first tour to Truc Lam Tay Thien Zen Monastery, so many people has returned to daily life and still consider this trip to be their useful monthly activity.
